verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man שִׂ֤ים <WH7760> set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> thy face אֶל־ <WH413> toward גּוֹג֙ <WH1463> against Gog אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land הַמָּג֔וֹג <WH4031> of Magog נְשִׂ֕יא <WH5387> prince רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> the chief מֶ֣שֶׁךְ <WH4902> of Meshech וְתֻבָ֑ל <WH8422> and Tubal וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> and prophesy עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> against

וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> And say כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> I am against גּ֔וֹג <WH1463> Behold I [am] against thee O Gog נְשִׂ֕יא <WH5387> prince רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> the chief מֶ֥שֶׁךְ <WH4902> of Meshech וְתֻבָֽל׃ <WH8422> and Tubal

וְשׁ֣וֹבַבְתִּ֔יךָ <WH7725> And I will turn thee back וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> and put חַחִ֖ים <WH2397> hooks בִּלְחָיֶ֑יךָ <WH3895> into thy jaws וְהוֹצֵאתִי֩ <WH3318> and I will bring thee forth אוֹתְךָ֨ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all חֵילֶ֜ךָ <WH2428> and all thine army סוּסִ֣ים <WH5483> horses וּפָרָשִׁ֗ים <WH6571> and horsemen לְבֻשֵׁ֤י <WH3847> all of them clothed מִכְלוֹל֙ <WH4358> with all sorts כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> all קָהָ֥ל <WH6951> company רָב֙ <WH7227> [of armour even] a great צִנָּ֣ה <WH6793> [with] bucklers וּמָגֵ֔ן <WH4043> and shields תֹּפְשֵׂ֥י <WH8610> all of them handling חֲרָב֖וֹת <WH2719> swords כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all
פָּרַ֛ס <WH6539> Persia כּ֥וּשׁ <WH3568> Ethiopia וּפ֖וּט <WH6316> and Libya אִתָּ֑ם <WH854> for כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> all מָגֵ֥ן <WH4043> with them all of them with shield וְכוֹבָֽע׃ <WH3553> and helmet

גֹּ֚מֶר <WH1586> Gomer וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲגַפֶּ֔יהָ <WH102> and all his bands בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> the house תּֽוֹגַרְמָ֔ה <WH8425> of Togarmah יַרְכְּתֵ֥י <WH3411> quarters צָפ֖וֹן <WH6828> of the north וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲגַפָּ֑יו <WH102> and all his bands עַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> [and] many אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> for

הִכֹּן֙ <WH3559> Be thou prepared וְהָכֵ֣ן <WH3559> and prepare לְךָ֔ אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all קְהָלֶ֖ךָ <WH6951> for thyself thou and all thy company הַנִּקְהָלִ֣ים <WH6950> that are assembled עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> about וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> become לָהֶ֖ם לְמִשְׁמָֽר׃ <WH4929> unto thee and be thou a guard

מִיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּים֮ <WH7227> After many תִּפָּקֵד֒ <WH6485> thou shalt be visited בְּאַחֲרִ֨ית <WH319> in the latter הַשָּׁנִ֜ים <WH8141> years תָּב֣וֹא ׀ <WH935> thou shalt come אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֣רֶץ ׀ <WH776> into the land מְשׁוֹבֶ֣בֶת <WH7725> [that is] brought back מֵחֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> from the sword מְקֻבֶּ֙צֶת֙ <WH6908> [and is] gathered מֵעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> out of many עַ֚ל <WH5921> unto הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> against the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָי֥וּ <WH1961> had been לְחָרְבָּ֖ה <WH2723> waste תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> which have been always וְהִיא֙ <WH1931> he מֵעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> out of the nations הוּצָ֔אָה <WH3318> but it is brought forth וְיָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> and they shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> safely כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all

וְעָלִ֙יתָ֙ <WH5927> Thou shalt ascend כַּשֹּׁאָ֣ה <WH7722> like a storm תָב֔וֹא <WH935> and come כֶּעָנָ֛ן <WH6051> thou shalt be like a cloud לְכַסּ֥וֹת <WH3680> to cover הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲגַפֶּ֔יךָ <WH102> thou and all thy bands וְעַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> and many אוֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH854> for ס

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3068> GOD וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> It shall also come to pass [that] at the same time הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יַעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> come דְבָרִים֙ <WH1697> shall things עַל־ <WH5921> into לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <WH3824> into thy mind וְחָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <WH2803> and thou shalt think מַחֲשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH4284> thought רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> an evil

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <WH559> And thou shalt say אֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <WH5927> I will go up עַל־ <WH5921> against אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> to the land פְּרָז֔וֹת <WH6519> of unwalled villages אָבוֹא֙ <WH935> I will go הַשֹּׁ֣קְטִ֔ים <WH8252> to them that are at rest יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> that dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> safely כֻּלָּ֗ם <WH3605> all יֹֽשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> all of them dwelling בְּאֵ֣ין <WH369> without חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> without walls וּבְרִ֥יחַ <WH1280> and having neither bars וּדְלָתַ֖יִם <WH1817> nor gates אֵ֥ין <WH369> and having לָהֶֽם׃

לִשְׁלֹ֥ל <WH7997> To take שָׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> a spoil וְלָבֹ֣ז <WH962> and to take בַּ֑ז <WH957> a prey לְהָשִׁ֨יב <WH7725> to turn יָדְךָ֜ <WH3027> thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> against חֳרָב֣וֹת <WH2723> upon the desolate places נוֹשָׁבֹ֗ת <WH3427> [that are now] inhabited וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against עַם֙ <WH5971> and upon the people מְאֻסָּ֣ף <WH622> [that are] gathered מִגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> out of the nations עֹשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> which have gotten מִקְנֶ֣ה <WH4735> cattle וְקִנְיָ֔ן <WH7075> and goods יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> that dwell עַל־ <WH5921> against טַבּ֥וּר <WH2872> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

שְׁבָ֡א <WH7614> Sheba וּ֠דְדָן <WH1719> and Dedan וְסֹחֲרֵ֨י <WH5503> and the merchants תַרְשִׁ֤ישׁ <WH8659> of Tarshish וְכָל־ <WH3605> all כְּפִרֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3715> with all the young lions יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> thereof shall say לְךָ֔ הֲלִשְׁלֹ֤ל <WH7997> to take שָׁלָל֙ <WH7998> prey אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> have you בָ֔א <WH935> unto thee Art thou come הֲלָבֹ֥ז <WH962> to take בַּ֖ז <WH957> plunder הִקְהַ֣לְתָּ <WH6950> assemble קְהָלֶ֑ךָ <WH6951> thy company לָשֵׂ֣את ׀ <WH5375> to carry כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> silver וְזָהָ֗ב <WH2091> and gold לָקַ֙חַת֙ <WH3947> to take away מִקְנֶ֣ה <WH4735> cattle וְקִנְיָ֔ן <WH7075> and goods לִשְׁלֹ֖ל <WH7997> to take שָׁלָ֥ל <WH7998> prey גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> a great ס

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> prophesy בֶן־ <WH1121> Therefore son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say לְג֔וֹג <WH1463> unto Gog כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD הֲל֣וֹא ׀ <WH3808> not בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he בְּשֶׁ֨בֶת <WH3427> dwelleth עַמִּ֧י <WH5971> when my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> safely תֵּדָֽע׃ <WH3045> shalt thou not know

וּבָ֤אתָ <WH935> And thou shalt come מִמְּקֽוֹמְךָ֙ <WH4725> from thy place מִיַּרְכְּתֵ֣י <WH3411> parts צָפ֔וֹן <WH6828> out of the north אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> you וְעַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> thou and many אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> for רֹכְבֵ֤י <WH7392> with thee all of them riding סוּסִים֙ <WH5483> upon horses כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> all קָהָ֥ל <WH6951> company גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> a great וְחַ֥יִל <WH2428> army רָֽב׃ <WH7227> and a mighty

וְעָלִ֙יתָ֙ <WH5927> And thou shalt come up עַל־ <WH5921> against עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> against my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כֶּֽעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> as a cloud לְכַסּ֣וֹת <WH3680> to cover הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land בְּאַחֲרִ֨ית <WH319> it shall be in the latter הַיָּמִ֜ים <WH3117> days תִּֽהְיֶ֗ה <WH1961> shall come וַהֲבִאוֹתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH935> and I will bring עַל־ <WH5921> against אַרְצִ֔י <WH776> thee against my land לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> so דַּ֨עַת <WH3045> may know הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <WH1471> that the heathen אֹתִ֗י <WH853> בְּהִקָּדְשִׁ֥י <WH6942> me when I shall be sanctified בְךָ֛ לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5869> before their eyes גּֽוֹג׃ <WH1463> in thee O Gog ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הַֽאַתָּה־ <WH859> are you ה֨וּא <WH1931> the one אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of whom דִּבַּ֜רְתִּי <WH1696> [Art] thou he of whom I have spoken בְּיָמִ֣ים <WH3117> time קַדְמוֹנִ֗ים <WH6931> in old בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> by עֲבָדַי֙ <WH5650> my servants נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> the prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הַֽנִּבְּאִ֛ים <WH5012> which prophesied בַּיָּמִ֥ים <WH3117> in those days הָהֵ֖ם <WH1992> those שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> [many] years לְהָבִ֥יא <WH935> that I would bring אֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> against ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass at the same time הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> when בּ֥וֹא <WH935> shall come גוֹג֙ <WH1463> Gog עַל־ <WH5921> against אַדְמַ֣ת <WH127> against the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD תַּעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> shall come up חֲמָתִ֖י <WH2534> [that] my fury בְּאַפִּֽי׃ <WH639> in my face

וּבְקִנְאָתִ֥י <WH7068> For in my jealousy בְאֵשׁ־ <WH784> [and] in the fire עֶבְרָתִ֖י <WH5678> of my wrath דִּבַּ֑רְתִּי <WH1696> have I spoken אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֣א ׀ <WH3808> not בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> Surely in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become רַ֣עַשׁ <WH7494> shaking גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> there shall be a great עַ֖ל <WH5921> in אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> in the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְרָעֲשׁ֣וּ <WH7493> shall shake מִפָּנַ֡י <WH6440> that [are] upon the face דְּגֵ֣י <WH1709> So that the fishes הַיָּם֩ <WH3220> of the sea וְע֨וֹף <WH5775> and the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> of the heaven וְחַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> and the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> of the field וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָרֶ֙מֶשׂ֙ <WH7431> and all creeping things הָרֹמֵ֣שׂ <WH7430> that creep עַל־ <WH5921> on הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> upon the earth וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> and all the men אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> at פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> at my presence הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of the earth וְנֶהֶרְס֣וּ <WH2040> shall be thrown down הֶהָרִ֗ים <WH2022> and the mountains וְנָֽפְלוּ֙ <WH5307> shall fall הַמַּדְרֵג֔וֹת <WH4095> and the steep places וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every חוֹמָ֖ה <WH2346> and every wall לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> to the ground תִּפּֽוֹל׃ <WH5307> shall fall

וְקָרָ֨אתִי <WH7121> And I will call עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> against לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָרַי֙ <WH2022> against him throughout all my mountains חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> for a sword נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> sword אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man's בְּאָחִ֥יו <WH251> shall be against his brother תִּֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וְנִשְׁפַּטְתִּ֥י <WH8199> And I will plead אִתּ֖וֹ <WH853> בְּדֶ֣בֶר <WH1698> against him with pestilence וּבְדָ֑ם <WH1818> and with blood וְגֶ֣שֶׁם <WH1653> rain שׁוֹטֵף֩ <WH7857> that [are] with him an overflowing וְאַבְנֵ֨י <WH68> stones אֶלְגָּבִ֜ישׁ <WH417> great hail אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire וְגָפְרִ֗ית <WH1614> and brimstone אַמְטִ֤יר <WH4305> and I will rain עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and וְעַל־ <WH5921> on אֲגַפָּ֔יו <WH102> upon him and upon his bands וְעַל־ <WH5921> and עַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> and upon the many אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

וְהִתְגַּדִּלְתִּי֙ <WH1431> Thus will I magnify וְהִתְקַדִּשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6942> myself and sanctify וְנ֣וֹדַעְתִּ֔י <WH3045> myself and I will be known לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the eyes גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> of many וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD ס
